Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the extent of the lack of international pressure on Iran when the current administration took office.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or data to support the assertion that there was "virtually no international pressure" on Iran.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the lack of international pressure on Iran was solely due to the previous administration's actions, without considering other factors or geopolitical dynamics.
Exist alternative explanation: The provided information suggests that there were diplomatic efforts and pressure on Iran during the final year of the previous administration, indicating an alternative explanation to the claim.
